title: Some creatures of the Barrier Reef
brief_description: A study of some of the unique marine animals of the Great Barrier Reef, which is noted for the variety and vivid colouring of its fauna. Also presents a general picture of the geographical formation of the reef.
description: A study of some of the unique marine animals of the Great Barrier Reef, which is noted for the variety and vivid colouring of its fauna. Also presents a general picture of the geographical formation of the reef.
